类 PtrFrameLayout

  • 所有已实现的接口:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent
    直接已知子类:
    PtrClassicFrameLayout

    public class PtrFrameLayout
extends android.view.ViewGroup
    This layout view for "Pull to Refresh(Ptr)" support all of the view, you can contain everything you want. support: pull to refresh / release to refresh / auto refresh / keep header view while refreshing / hide header view while refreshing It defines PtrUIHandler, which allows you customize the UI easily.

      • refreshComplete

        public final void refreshComplete()
        Call this when data is loaded. The UI will perform complete at once or after a delay, depends on the time elapsed is greater then mLoadingMinTime or not.
